0.post_text: Already having the FIFA World Cup fever? We’re getting into the spirit of the season early this year, and will be hosting the first of a series of Samba Celebration Weekend Carnivals this 7 June!  Held at McDonald’s Ang Mo Kio Ave 3, Blk 51, from 12pm to 4pm, everyone is welcome to join us for a day of games, soccer ball juggling challenges, and futsal competitions. Fun prizes are up for grabs, and for a taste of Brazil, we’re looking forward to some drum and passita performances, too! See you there.

I am not sure why Brazilian food is spicy which is not! I am Brazilian and I never had spicy food in my whole entire life in I AM BRAZILIAN. Actually, we eat rice and beans and loads of beef. Now, McDonald puts Portuguese names on food which has nothing to do with Brazil. Booooooooo! Very desapoiting!
Just to let you know! WE SPEAK PORTUGUESE NOT SPANISH!! The word "Fiesta" is a Spanish word. In Portuguese, we call Festa! Can you please hire someone who can do this right?! Ahhhhhhhhhhhh

1.post_text:
This FIFA World Cup season, we’re offering special menu items featuring tantalizing Brazilian flavours! The Spicy Brazilian Beef Picante burger and Sweet Chilli Lime Crispy Chicken Caramba burger are now available in restaurants, and remember to complete your Brazilian-inspired meal with a refreshing Fiesta Lime McFizz. For dessert – it’s your choice of a hot, toasty Copa-Banana Pie, or a Brasilia green cone. 

Psst… Our Samba Spicy Drumlets make excellent match companions too!

3.post_text: The inaugural McDonald’s Football Clinic is in full swing and our young football enthusiasts are having a blast! The clinic will end this Friday with a mini world cup tournament, and three talented kids will walk away with a one year scholarship at the ESPZEN Soccer School. Here’s a peek into the McDonald’s Football Clinic.

5.post_text:
We’ve got some good news for you. We’re giving away more free coffee this month! 

From 8am – 10am tomorrow, we’ll be at McCafé Tampines Blk 513 Tampines Central 1 to give out free Cappuccinos (small) to the first 100 customers! 

From 2pm - 4pm, we’ll be at McCafé White Sands to give out 100 free Double Chocolate Frappes (medium) to the first 100 customers! 

*Redemption is limited to one cup per customer, while stocks last.

7.post_text:
Hello Kitty Fact #6: Hello Kitty is officially 5 apples high and weighs 3 apples! 

Today, we’re launching the last character of our Hello Kitty Bubbly World series – the adorable Hello Kitty Bubbly Bad Badtz-maru, so don’t miss out! 

Each Hello Kitty Bubbly World plush toy is priced at $4.95 with purchase of an Extra Value Meal™. Customers can buy up to a maximum of 4 plush toys per store visit, while stocks last!

*Excludes McDonald’s Drive Thrus, McCafé, McDelivery and our restaurants at KK Hospital and Tampines Interchange Kiosk.
Terms and Conditions apply. You can also donate your meals to low- income families through The Straits Times School Pocket Money Fund. For more details, please visit our Hello Kitty Bubbly World page at www.mcdonalds.com.sg
